commit message: Initial commit
Update README.md
Update README.md with Guile's taunt shades

Created empty project.
Updated gitignore with the one produced by Android Studio.
Configured default app themes.

Removed appcompat library dependency.
Added settings gear icon to ActionBar.
Restructured app and activity themes.

Switched off styling for now.
Removed menu_shades.xml.
Removed unneeded settings gear icon.

Created ShadesFragment and accompanying Presenter.
Wired ShadesFragment and ShadesPresenter.
Attached ShadesFragment to ShadesActivity's layout.

Added ScreenFilterService command flags.
Added declarations for a ScreenFilterService command factory and an accompanying command parser.
Added logging in ScreenFilterService.onDestroy() and cleaned up imports.

Added WindowView and WindowViewManager.
Added various TODO comments.

Added states to ScreenFilterPresenter.
More null checks.

Added drawables for brightness and sunglasses icons.
Modified some documentation.
Added methods to set screen filter color and dim level.
Implemented FilterCommandFactory and FilterCommandParser.

Added sample implementation for handling service commands.
Implemented the previously declared methods to set screen filter color and dim level.
Initialized and wired up view and presenter in ScreenFilterService.
Moved the logic to start the ScreenFilterService into a new FilterCommandSender class.
Turned ShadesFragment into a PreferenceFragment. Added preference and layout placeholders.
Renamed member variables to follow Android convention of an 'm' prefix.

Implemented DimSeekBarPreference.
Added sample code to listen to the DimSeekBarPreference in ScreenFilterService.
Moved preference keys into a new string resource file: donottranslate_prefkeys.xml
Renamed wrongly named ic_brightness drawable png.
Added oval shape drawable resource.
Designed the layout for ColorPickerPreference.

Persisted ColorPickerPreference to SharedPreferences.
Added padding to the ShadesView PreferenceFragment to accomodate the future FAB.
Added comment regarding using layout change listener.
Minor spelling fix.
Cleaned up imports.
Swapped locations of purple and teal colors.
Used a ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener instead of a View.OnLayoutChangeListener to measure the FAB and set the bottom padding of the ListView.
Cleaned up ColorPickerPreference, ColorPicker, and their associated XML files.
Changed main app theme to AppCompat.
Added FAB that will later be used to turn on/off shades.
Added support to display the screen filter overtop the Status Bar, Notification area, and Navigation Bar.

Properly calculate height of screen filter.
Added BroadcastReceiver to recalculate height of screen filter on rotation change.
Removed testing view.
Created SettingsModel with listener to forward settings changes to Presenter.

Used appropriate default value when accessing shared preferences.
Moved preference key resource loading in SettingsModel into constructor.
Changed launcher icon.

Optimized ScreenFilterView's rendering performance by manually drawing the filter and drawing a color with an alpha channel instead of doing both a draw and an alpha change on the entire view itself (as opposed to the color).
Added FLAG_HARDWARE_ACCELERATED to WindowManager. Slightly improves performance, but still unsure of any side effects, if any, on older devices.
Added getters in SettingsModel to access the current dim level and color in SharedPreferences.

When ScreenFilterPresenter is in on state, initialize ScreenFilterView with current color and dim level before showing.
Removed unneeded ResumeState.
Saved the current on/off power state of the screen filter.

Added ServiceLifeCycleController for ScreenFilterPresenter to shut down the ScreenFilterService when appropriate.
Cleaned up ScreenFilterPresenter ctor.
Refactored orientation change BroadcastReceiver out into its own file.
Modified both activity and service properly register/unregister to/from SharedPreferences change notifications by tying it in with their respective lifecycles.
ShadesActivity now listens to power state changes to updates the FAB icon accordingly.
Minor clean up.
Added fade-in and fade-out animations when turning on and off shades.
Added future pause state handling in ShadesPresenter to display correct FAB icon.

Added getter and setter for pause state in SettingsModel.
Created test notification to use when service runs in foreground.
Update README.md
Constructed foreground notification.
Fixed bug where shades FAB icon wasn't updated on activity start/resume.
Created new drawable resources.
Cleaned up notification creation for foreground service.

Finished implementing on, pause, and off state handling of service commands.
Added settings icon to foreground notification to open up ShadesActivity.
Added content intent to foreground notification to open up ShadesActivity.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:cngu/shades
Animated filter color changes.
Made use of @NonNull annotation instead of using null checks.

Added BootReceiver to handle various flag settings and to restore state if device shuts off while the application is running.
Fixed NullPointerException on Android 4.4 where the empty string must be used instead of null for notification text.
Added drawable resources for different densities.

Fixed bug in boot receiver where the 'resume after reboot' flag had an effect when it should have been ignored, i.e., when the 'always open on boot' flag was set.
Made the two startup preference settings options mutually exclusive.
Remove debug button.
Bug fix where shades color is not initialized after boot from off to paused state.
Added missing drawable resources.
Cleaned up comments and imports.
Update README.md

Change alpha and color calculations of the filter

It now factors in the dim factor and the intensity of the color. This
allows for more precise color/darkness combinations. The intensity can
not be changed from the application yet.
Add filter intensity level slider and animations

Change from color picker to color temperature slider

Instead of choosing distinct colors from a list, you can now decide an
exact color temperature between 500 and 4000 Kelvin. This allows for
more precision and removes unneeded colors.

Rebrand from 'Shades' to 'Red moon'

New icon, new package, new color and an actionbar switch instead of a
floating action button.
Switch 'stop' and 'pause' button in notification
Change shades icons to moon icons

Remove unused resources

Remove unused icons and definitions.
Add a new moon icon
Enable support for RTL layouts
Update README.md and LICENSE
Up the version code
